Event.name: Offering
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Offerer</fen> indicates that he or she is able and willing to give a <fen>Theme</fen> to a <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>. In the absence of further qualifications, it is often understood that the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen> accepts the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Offerer">The host</fex> <fex name="Manner">graciously</fex> <t>offered</t> <fex name="Potential_recipient">us</fex> <fex name="Theme">food and drink</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Offerer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and offers it to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen> .</def-root>

Arg.name: Potential_recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The object which is offered for transfer.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> is the manner in which the <fen>Offerer</fen> offers the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> are the conditions under which the <fen>Theme</fen> is offered.
<ex><fex name="Offerer">I</fex> <t>offer</t> <fex name="Theme">my services</fex> <fex name="Circumstances">free of charge</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Imposed_purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>'s intended purpose for the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>Plesae <t>offer</t> a list of people <fex name="Imposed_purpose">for potential promotion</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>A description of the <fen>Offerer</fen>, <fen>Potential_recipient</fen>, or <fen>Theme</fen> given independently of the giving event per se.</def-root>

Arg.name: Period_of_iterations
Arg.definition: <def-root>The length of time from when the offer began to be repeated to when it stopped.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: proffer.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put forward as an offer.

lexUnit.name: serve.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: To offer for use or consumption, typically of food.
